changeSet.author: mbemis
changeSet.sql: insert into NEW_ENTITY_ATTRIBUTE (name, value_string, value_number, value_boolean, value_entity_ref, list_index, owner_id) select a.name, a.value_string, a.value_number, a.value_boolean, ref.id, a.list_index, e.id from ENTITY e join ENTITY_ATTRIBUTE ea on ea.entity_id = e.old_uuid join ATTRIBUTE a on ea.attribute_id = a.id left join ENTITY ref on a.value_entity_ref=ref.old_uuid;

changeSet.author: mbemis
changeSet.sql: insert into NEW_WORKSPACE_ATTRIBUTE (name, value_string, value_number, value_boolean, value_entity_ref, list_index, owner_id) select a.name, a.value_string, a.value_number, a.value_boolean, ref.id, a.list_index, w.id from WORKSPACE w join WORKSPACE_ATTRIBUTE wa on wa.workspace_id = w.id join ATTRIBUTE a on wa.attribute_id = a.id left join ENTITY ref on a.value_entity_ref=ref.old_uuid;

changeSet.author: mbemis
changeSet.sql: insert into SUBMISSION_ATTRIBUTE (uuid, name, value_string, value_number, value_boolean, value_entity_ref, list_index, owner_id) select a.id, a.name, a.value_string, a.value_number, a.value_boolean, ref.id, a.list_index, sv.id from SUBMISSION_VALIDATION sv join ATTRIBUTE a on a.id = sv.value_id left join ENTITY ref on a.value_entity_ref=ref.old_uuid;
